name: Jarvis AI Assistant
description: A conversational AI assistant inspired by Jarvis from Iron Man, powered by the Gemini 2.5 Native Audio (Live API). Engage in real-time voice conversations. Please note: advanced mobile device control (e.g., app management, phone locking, reading system notifications, making calls, sending messages directly to other apps like WhatsApp) is not technically feasible for a web application due to browser security restrictions and operating system sandboxing. This application focuses on simulating the conversational intelligence.
